sn4.22:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati silāvatiyaṃ.
sn4.22:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato avidūre appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharati.
sn4.22:4.3: Atha kho āyasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn4.22:4.4: “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me satthā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho.
sn4.22:4.5: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yvāhaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajito.
sn4.22:4.6: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me sabrahmacārino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti.
sn4.22:4.7: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato samiddhissa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.22:4.8: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmato samiddhissa avidūre mahantaṃ bhayabheravaṃ saddamakāsi, apissudaṃ pathavī maññe undrīyati.
sn4.22:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn4.22:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn4.22:5.4: “idhāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato avidūre appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharāmi.
sn4.22:5.5: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn4.22:5.6: ‘lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me satthā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho.
sn4.22:5.7: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yvāhaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajito.
sn4.22:5.8: Lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me sabrahmacārino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā’ti.
sn4.22:5.9: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, avidūre mahābhayabheravasaddo ahosi, apissudaṃ pathavī maññe undrīyatī”ti.
sn4.22:6.2: Māro eso pāpimā tuyhaṃ vicakkhukammāya āgato.
sn4.22:6.3: Gaccha tvaṃ, samiddhi, tattheva appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharāhī”ti.
sn4.22:6.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn4.22:6.5: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā samiddhi tattheva appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihāsi.
sn4.22:6.6: Dutiyampi kho āyasmato samiddhissa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa … pe …
sn4.22:6.7: dutiyampi kho māro pāpimā āyasmato samiddhissa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya … pe …
sn4.22:6.9: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.22:8.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ samiddhi bhikkhū”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
